name: CXProviderDelegate
desc: A collection of methods that are called by a telephony provider object.

items.name: func providerDidReset(CXProvider)
items.desc: Called when the provider is reset.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, execute: CXTransaction) -> Bool
items.desc: Called when a transaction is executed by a call controller.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXStartCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified start call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXAnswerCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified answer call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXEndCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified end call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXSetHeldCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified set held call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXSetMutedCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified set muted call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXSetGroupCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified set group call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, perform: CXPlayDTMFCallAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified play DTMF (dual tone multifrequency) call action.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, timedOutPerforming: CXAction)
items.desc: Called when the provider performs the specified action times out.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, didActivate: AVAudioSession)
items.desc: Called when the provider’s audio session is activated.

items.name: func provider(CXProvider, didDeactivate: AVAudioSession)
items.desc: Called when the provider’s audio session is deactivated.
